requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Refund to expired original card". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Contact roles per account (decision maker, billing, operator)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
